description.en: Gives +1.5% Critical Chance, +1.5% Attack Speed when applied to a pierced weapon or shield.
description.ar: Gives +1.5% Critical Chance, +1.5% Attack Speed when applied to a pierced weapon or shield.
description.br: Concede um aumento de +1,5% de Acerto Crítico e +1,5% de Velocidade de Ataque quando aplicada em Arma ou Escudo perfurado.
description.cns: 暴击率+1.5%, 攻击速度+1.5%(放置在武器或盾牌穿洞槽时)
description.de: Verleiht +1,5 Kritische Trefferrate, +1,5 Angriffstempo wenn angewendet auf eine gesockelte Waffe oder Schild.
description.fi: Gives +1.5% Critical Chance, +1.5% Attack Speed when applied to a pierced weapon or shield.
description.fil: Gives +1.5% Critical Chance, +1.5% Attack Speed when applied to a pierced weapon or shield.
description.fr: Chances de Coups Critique et Vitesse d'Attaque augmentée de +1.5%, en glissant la carte dans un emplacement percé de votre arme ou armure.
description.id: Memberikan +1,5% Critical Chance, +1,5% Attack Speed saat diterapkan pada senjata atau perisai yang ditembus.
description.it: Gives +1.5% Critical Chance, +1.5% Attack Speed when applied to a pierced weapon or shield.
description.jp: 武器や盾に装着するとクリティカル率/攻撃速度+1.5%
description.kr: Gives +1.5% Critical Chance, +1.5% Attack Speed when applied to a pierced weapon or shield.
description.nl: Gives +1.5% Critical Chance, +1.5% Attack Speed when applied to a pierced weapon or shield.
description.pl: Gives +1.5% Critical Chance, +1.5% Attack Speed when applied to a pierced weapon or shield.
description.ru: Gives +1.5% Critical Chance, +1.5% Attack Speed when applied to a pierced weapon or shield.
description.sp: Otorga +1,5 % Probabilidad Crítica, +1,5 % Velocidad de Ataque cuando se aplica a un arma o escudo perforado.
description.sw: Gives +1.5% Critical Chance, +1.5% Attack Speed when applied to a pierced weapon or shield.
description.th: โอกาสติดคริติคอล +1.5% , +1.5% ความเร็วการโจมตี เมื่อใส่ลงในอาวุธหรือโล่ที่ถูกเจาะแล้ว
description.tw: 當應用於精煉武器或盾牌時，提供 +1.5% 暴擊率和 +1.5% 攻擊速度。
description.vi: Cung cấp +1,5% Critical Chance, +1,5% Attack Speed khi áp dụng cho pierced weapon or shield.
